data.name: AddResources_NotEnoughSpace_Message
data.value:
There is not enough free disk space on '{0}'. The file '{1}' can't be added.
Please free some disk space and check the values in MediaConfiguration.xml.

data.name: ExportController_FileAlreadyExists
data.value: The file already exists, if you continue it will be replaced. Continue?

data.name: ExportController_PresentationExportError
data.value:
Something went wrong when exporting the project.
Please check the logs for further information.

data.name: Project_DeleteResourceIsUsed
data.value: The resource {0} can't be deleted. It is used in the project.

data.name: Project_OpenRecent_ErrorMessage
data.value: Error loading the project. It will be removed from the list of recent projects.

data.name: Project_Open_NotEnoughSpace_Message
data.value:
There is not enough available disk space on '{0}'. The project '{1}' can't be opened.
Please free some disk space and check the values in MediaConfiguration.xml.

data.name: Project_UnsavedBox_Content
data.value: The current project has unsaved changes.{0}Yes: Save changes locally{0}No: Restore last saved state

data.name: Shell_Information_OnlyOneFrameAllowed
data.value: Only one frame per layout is allowed

data.name: ExportController_DestinationNotEmpty
data.value: One or more of the resource directories 'Images', 'Videos', 'Pools', 'Symbols', 'Fonts', 'Audio', '*.csv' already exist. If you continue everything will be overwritten. Continue?

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_And
data.value: This function returns TRUE if all arguments evaluate to TRUE. If one or more arguments evaluate to FALSE, the function returns FALSE.

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_CsvMapping
data.value: This function returns the value of the column defined in "OutputFormat" if the values of the operands (columns) match. "FileName" contains the csv file to use.

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_Date
data.value: This function returns TRUE if the current date is between Begin and End.

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_DayOfWeek
data.value: This function returns TRUE if the current week day is set to TRUE.

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_Equals
data.value: Not supported. It is enough to use „=“

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_Format
data.value: This function replaces the placeholders defined in "Format" with the values of the arguments.

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_Generic
data.value: This function returns the value of the chosen dictionary cell.

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_GreaterThan
data.value: Not supported. It's enough to use „>“

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_GreaterThanOrEqual
data.value: Not supported. It's enough to use „>=“

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_If
data.value: This function returns the value of "Then" if the "Condition" is evaluated to TRUE, otherwise the function returns the value of "Else".

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_IntegerCompare
data.value: This function returns TRUE if the value is between Begin and End.

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_LessThan
data.value: Not supported. It' enough to use „<“.

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_LessThanOrEqual
data.value: Not supported. It' enough to use „<=“

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_Not
data.value: This function changes FALSE to TRUE, or TRUE to FALSE.

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_NotEquals
data.value: Not supported. It' enough to use „<>“

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_Or
data.value: This function returns TRUE if at least one argument evaluates to TRUE, otherwise it returns FALSE.

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_StringCompare
data.value: This function returns TRUE if "Value" and "Evaluation" are equal.

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_Switch
data.value: This function returns the value of the operand which "case" is equal to the "Value". If no "case" is equal the "Default" is returned.

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_TextToImage
data.value: This function returns the image with the name returned by the value of the dynamic text.

data.name: FormulaEditor_Help_Time
data.value: This function returns TRUE if the time is between Begin and End.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_Container_TooManyArguments
data.value: The expression can only contain one argument.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_IF_MissingConditionArgument
data.value: An if expression requires a <condition> argument. Usage: IF ( <condition> ; <then> ; <else> )

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_IF_MissingThenArgument
data.value: An if expression requires a <then> argument. Usage: IF ( <condition> ; <then> ; <else> )

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_IF_TooManyArguments
data.value: Too many arguments for if expression. Usage: IF ( <condition> ; <then> ; <else> )

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_Collection_NotEnoughArguments
data.value: The expression requires at least two arguments.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_FORMAT_FirstArgumentNotString
data.value: The first argument of a Format expression needs to be a string. Usage: Format ( <format-string> ; <parameters> ; ... )

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_GENERIC_NoNegativeRowsAllowed
data.value: Error in dictionary selection, negative row values are not allowed.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_GENERIC_NoSuchColumnFound
data.value: Error in dictionary selection, column '{0}' does not exist.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_GENERIC_NoSuchTableFound
data.value: Error in dictionary selection, table '{0}' does not exist.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_GENERIC_TableIsMultiRow
data.value: Error in dictionary selection, table requires a row index.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_GENERIC_TableIsNotMultirow
data.value: Error in dictionary selection, table does not require a row index.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_GENERIC_TablIsMultiLanguage
data.value: Error in dictionary selection, table does require a language name.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_GENERIC_TablIsNotMultiLanguage
data.value: Error in dictionary selection, table does not require a language name.

data.value: The first argument of the CsvMapping expression needs to be a string

data.value: The layout '{0}' can't be removed because it is being used in the following sections:

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_CSVMAPPING_SecondArgumentNotString
data.value: The second argument of the CsvMapping expression needs to be a string.

data.value: The first argument of the Date expression needs to be a string.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_Date_SecondArgumentNotString
data.value: The second argument of the Date expression needs to be a string.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_Date_TooManyArguments
data.value: The Date expression has too many arguments.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_DayOfWeek_ArgumentsNeedToBeBool
data.value: The DayOfWeek arguments need to be boolean.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_DayOfWeek_TooManyArguments
data.value: The DayOfWeek expression has to many arguments.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_Time_FirstArgumentNotString
data.value: The first argument of the Time expression needs to be string.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_Time_SecondArgumentNotString
data.value: The second argument of the TIME expression needs to be string.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_Case_FirstArgumentNotConstant
data.value: Left side of switch case should be constant

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_IntegerCompare_SecondArgumentNotInt
data.value: The second argument of the IntegerCompare expression needs to be int.

data.value: The third argument of the IntegerCompare expression needs to be int.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_IntegerCompare_TooManyArguments
data.value: Too many arguments for IntegerCompare expression. Usage: IntegerCompare ( <Generic> ; <int> ; <int> )

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_StringCompare_SecondArgumentNotConstant
data.value: The second argument of the StringCompare expression needs to be a string

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_StringCompare_ThirdArgumentNotBool
data.value: The third argument of the StringCompare expression needs to be bool (true, false).

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_StringCompare_TooManyArguments
data.value: Too many arguments for StringCompare expression. Usage: StringCompare ( <Generic> ; <string> ; <bool> )

data.value: The second argument of the TextToImage expression needs to be a string.

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_TextToImage_TooManyArguments
data.value: Too many arguments for TextToImage expression. Usage: TextToImage ( <Generic> ; <string> )

data.value: First string does not contain a date. Use format <dd.mm.yyyy>

data.name: FormulaParser_Error_Date_SecondArgumentNotDate
data.value: Second string does not contain a date. Use format <dd.mm.yyyy>

data.value: A binary expression requires a <left> argument.
